data.text:
@lungisaximbi @willemhuman @gillianoberholzer @stefanbar @yasserogier 

As discussed, I captured case 2428 this morning with one dependant on both 1st and 2nd capture and when I got to the comparison stage, there was no dependant details to select even though I captured a different first name on purpose. Also got the message, "No dependats" when I got to the dependant section of verification.
